###4.14
Variable Browser (continued)
Let's step through the program and see if any variables change.
Click on the Step Over button.
The green PC highlight has advanced one line.
Click again on the Step Over button.
Notice that the result cell for dx now has a folded right corner.  Clicking the corner toggles between the current and previous values.
Try toggling between the new and old values of dx. When you are done, click on the bottom right arrow to continue.
